name: RabbitHole
intro: Earn tokens by participating in the best cryptonetworks
introduce:
RabbitHole is building an on-chain platform that makes it easy for projects to bootstrap their community — from discovery, to onboarding, to training, to scale.RabbitHole guides users through Web3, equipping them with on-chain credentials that prove the knowledge they’ve gained. RabbitHole uses these credentials to help top crypto projects find the best participants for their protocol.
By curating an on-chain graph of a user’s prior achievements, RabbitHole is creating the on-chain resume for the future of work and becoming the best place to find contributors and discover work in Web3.
